doc:
R. D. Robb https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R._D._Robb 0 R. D. Robb (born March 31, 1972) is an American former actor who appeared as Schwartz in the 1983 film A Christmas Story. He was nominated for an Edda Award in 2005. In 2001 he co-wrote and directed the film Don's Plum. R._D. Robb ( born March_31_,_1972 ) is an_American_former_actor who appeared as Schwartz in the_1983_film A_Christmas_Story . He was_nominated for an_Edda_Award in 2005 . In 2001 he co-wrote_and_directed the_film Don 's_Plum .
